DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation potential perpetrator effect BAY1841788 ( ODM-201 ) rosuvastatin pharmacokinetics . PK BAY1841788 ( ODM-201 ) single repeat administration male female subject .
DOC.brief_title: Drug-drug Interaction Study Using Rosuvastatin Breast Cancer Resistant Protein ( Efflux Transporter ) , Organic Anion-transporting Polypeptide ( OATP ) 1B1 , OATP1B3 ( Uptake Transporters ) Probe Substrate
DOC.criteria: Healthy subject determine medical history , physical examination procedure require protocol . Age : 45 65 year screen visit . Race : White . Body mass index ( BMI ) : ≥18.0 ≤29.9 kg/m*2 . Adequate venous access ( frequent blood sample ) . Ability understand follow studyrelated instruction . Females postmenopausal state , reveal : Medical history , applicable ( natural menopause least 12 month prior first study drug administration ; surgical menopause bilateral ovariectomy least 3 month prior first study drugadministration ) follicle stimulate hormone ( FSH ) > 40 IU/L screen examination . Male subject must agree use condom effective contraception barrier method whole study ( start inform consent ) 3 month end treatment BAY1841788 ( ODM201 ) . In addition , participant must agree utilize second reliable method contraception simultaneously . The second method use female partner childbearing potential one follow method : diaphragm cervical cap spermicide intrauterine device hormonebased contraception . Medical surgical history Subjects clinically relevant finding medical history e.g . history currently exist relevant disease vital organ , central nervous system ( example seizure ) organ ( e.g . diabetes mellitus ) . Incompletely cure preexisting disease assume absorption , distribution , metabolism , elimination effect study drug normal . Febrile illness within 1 week first study drug administration . A medical history risk factor Torsades de Pointes ( e.g . family history Long QT interval electrocardiogram Syndrome ) arrhythmia . History myopathia treatment statin . History rhabdomyolysis myopathia . Medical history type psychiatric disorder , especially mood disorder include medical history suicidal ideation and/or suicide attempt . History thyroid disorder , especially hypothyreosis . History respiratory disorder ( exclude history bronchitis pneumonia ) . History myasthenia . History muscle pain muscle ache , muscle soreness unknown origin frequent occasion although origin might find . History clinically significant hypoglycemia hyperglycemia . Relevant hepatic disorder like history viral hepatitis , cholestasis , disturbance bilirubin metabolism , progressive liver disease . Relevant renal disorder like recurrent glomerulonephritis , renal injury , renal insufficiency . However , history single episode uncomplicated nephrolithiasis prevent participation .
